item.title: Helm
item.description: The ecosystem of helm already provides different plugins and solutions which can be used to implement more advanced concepts. Post-Rendering Helm offers the option to embed your own post renderers. They allow to usage of other executables. In contrast, our post renderers are a bit simpler, but just scoped to the possibilities Srig itself has to offer. Read more: https://helm.sh/docs/topics/advanced/#post-rendering Secrets Helm-Secretsis a great plugin which allows to encrypt helm secrets via sops.
